args.content:
import Mathlib
open Complex

/--
Let f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚ and z0 : â„‚. Translate the statement:
lim_{z -> z0} f(z) = âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z - z0| < Î´.

In Lean, interpret lim to âˆž as Tendsto (fun z => (f z : WithTop â„‚)) (ð“ z0) atTop. The right-hand side is: âˆ€ M > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z : â„‚, dist z z0 < Î´ â†’ â€–f zâ€– > M.
-/
theorem tendsto_riemann_sphere_atTop_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (z0 : â„‚) :
  Tendsto (fun z => (f z : WithTop â„‚)) (ð“ z0) atTop â†”
    âˆ€ M > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z : â„‚, dist z z0 < Î´ â†’ â€–f zâ€– > M := by
  sorry

import Mathlib
open Complex

/--
Let f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚ and z0 : â„‚. Translate the statement:
lim_{z -> z0} f(z) = âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z - z0| < Î´.

In Lean, interpret lim to âˆž as Tendsto (fun z => (f z : WithTop â„‚)) (ð“ z0) atTop. The right-hand side is: âˆ€ M > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z : â„‚, dist z z0 < Î´ â†’ â€–f zâ€– > M.
-/
theorem tendsto_riemann_sphere_atTop_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (z0 : â„‚) :
  Tendsto (fun z => (f z : WithTop â„‚)) (ð“ z0) atTop â†”
    âˆ€ M > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z : â„‚, dist z z0 < Î´ â†’ â€–f zâ€– > M := by
  sorry

import Mathlib
open Complex

/--
Define what it means for lim_{z -> z0} f(z) to be infinity in the Riemann sphere sense.
-/
def limit_infty_riemann_sphere (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (z0 : â„‚) : Prop :=
  Tendsto (fun z : â„‚ => (f z : WithTop â„‚)) (ð“ z0) atTop

/--
Translate the statement: lim_{z -> z0} f(z) = âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere
iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever |z - z0| < Î´.
-/
theorem tendsto_riemann_sphere_atTop_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (z0 : â„‚) :
  limit_infty_riemann_sphere f z0 â†”
    âˆ€ M > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z : â„‚, dist z z0 < Î´ â†’ â€–f zâ€– > M := by
  sorry
